eecs.jago.element
Class Wall

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--eecs.jago.element.SimElement
        |
        +--eecs.jago.element.VisibleElement
              |
              +--eecs.jago.element.SolidElement
                    |
                    +--eecs.jago.element.Wall
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collidable, java.lang.Runnable, Visible
public class Wall
extends SolidElement

Creates wall sections for mazes and other obstacles. The class defines five different types of sections, each defined by the image that represents it:

  • Vertical Long
  • Horizontal Long
  • Horizontal Half
  • Horizontal Three-Quarters
  • Horizontal Quarter
In addition to the standard-sized wall sections, the user can also create a wall by specifying only the size. A wall defined by size will have the default textured appearance of a grey rock-like wall.

Constructor Detail

Wall

public Wall(int type)
Creates a wall specified by the type. The type must be one of the following constants:
  • Wall.VERT_LONG
  • Wall.HORZ_LONG
  • Wall.HORZ_HALF
  • Wall.HORZ_THREE_QUARTER
  • Wall.HORZ_QUARTER

Parameters:
type - DOCUMENT ME!

Wall

public Wall(int width,
            int height)
Creates a new Wall with the specified dimensions. Walls created using this constructor will have a default wall texture.

Parameters:
width - The width of the wall (in pixels).
height - The height of the wall (in pixels).

setTexture

protected void setTexture(java.lang.String image)
Sets the texture of a standard wall to the specified image.
